_header: Spell yet I would speak if I could
Subjects: dialogues; Virgin Mary, as speaker in debate; Bernard of Clairveaux, saint; Passion
_description: Dialogue between the Virgin Mary and St. Bernard on the Passion (incorporated in the Cursor Mundi — in 104 6-line stanzas preceded by a six-couplet introduction
